And if you missed the Genius Scan 4.4 release notes:

With this major release of Genius Scan, we are simplifying the scan flow and making your documents even more safe!

SCAN FLOW
There was no good reason to distinguish single page documents from multi-page documents. The Batch Mode is now the only option for scanning.

AUTO SAVE
Any document you start scanning is automatically saved in Genius Scan on your device. You don't even have to tap on "Save" for your document to be kept safe. If you don't want that document, you can simply delete it, but better err on the side of caution.

DRAG & DROP
We've added support for Drag & Drop on iPad. You can easily drag a document out of Genius Scan as a PDF and drop any PDF or images in Genius Scan in order to import them.

IMPROVEMENTS
- The photo albums are now sorted alphabetically when importing a picture.
- Some photo albums (such as "Screenshots") were not available when selecting a photo to Genius Scan. This is now history.
- The progress indicator is more granular for your Genius Cloud document synchronization, so even if you have a lot of documents you will get an idea of how much time left there is.
- Your device's screen won't go to sleep while you are scanning a large document.

BUG FIXES
- Fixed duplicate files created when exporting the same document twice to Google Drive
- When importing a PDF form, annotations are now properly imported as well!

If you like Genius Scan, do let a review on the App Store: this helps us a lot! Your feedback is always welcome, contact us at support@thegrizzlylabs.com. We read and reply to every email.

+ ACCESS DOCUMENTS FROM YOUR COMPUTER [requires a Genius Cloud subscription]
If you are a Genius Cloud subscriber, you can now access your documents directly from geniuscloud.com. We've also added support for Handoff so that you can scan a document and directly open geniuscloud.com on your Mac.

+ SINGLE/BATCH
Due to popular demand, we have restored the single/batch mode switch in the camera screen. If you scan single page document, this will let you go faster.

+ BUG FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS
- Fixed a bug where the tag screen could appear empty.
- Fixed incorrect import of PDF pages
- When exporting a single page, it won't be named "DocumentName-page 1" anymore but just "DocumentName".

You may think that French people would take an entire summer off while leaving you alone facing up your paperwork. Not true! Here is your brand new Genius Scan, full of new amazing features.

REDESIGNED DOCUMENT MANAGEMENT:

- Redesigned main document list with clarity in mind. We have simplified it so that you quickly find your most important features. The search field only appears when you want it (pull down on the main list). If you have tagged documents, the tags will be displayed alongside the document title.
- Unified document page list and full screen view. These two different screens led to a lot of confusion but they are now merged into a single screen. You can swipe horizontally to go to the next page.
- Improved zooming controls. You can now use a double-tap and double-tap & drag gesture to control zooming on a document’s page
- Copy pages. You can now duplicate a page into another document (in addition to moving it from a document to another document).
- Export status indicator. Your documents are important and we want you to know whether they have been exported or not, so we have added an export status indicator. Green means all good. In every document, you will be able to see its export history. If you are looking at your global export history, you will find it under Settings > Export > Export History but this is now deprecated.
- Safety. We haved added more confirmations before destructive actions such as deleting a document or merging documents together.

REDESIGNED SCAN FLOW:

- Reorganized camera screen. You can quickly access your existing photos and your documents stored in the Files app. A press on the + button lets you directly import your documents from Photos and Files.
- Quick Actions. We introduce Quick Actions which let you quickly edit your scan right after snapping the picture – or delete it if you are unhappy. As a consequence, we have removed the "Manual" mode as it's now replaced with these Quick Actions.
- Improved image processing. We have perfected the post-processing of document shadows which means that Genius Scan is much better at removing them.

We hope you will like this new release! We know there are changes that will affect some of you but know that we took a lot of care and thinking to make sure this was a largely positive change for everyone in terms of UX and safety. If you have any questions or feedback, please let us know at support@thegrizzlylabs.com as this will help us improve on it or address issues you may encounter.

You can easily create a Siri shortcut such as "View passport" if you travel a lot.

FULLSCREEN MODE
When viewing your documents, a single tap will switch the screen to fullscreen mode, hiding the toolbars and using all the available space to display your documents. You may benefit from this if you use Genius Scan to read documents such as music scores, magazines etc.

CROP SCREEN

SAVED PASSWORDS
Genius Scan integrates with iCloud Keychain to let you log in easily in your Genius Cloud account accross all your devices and on the web app.

SENDER EMAIL
You can now define your preferred account for emailing documents from Genius Scan. You can configure this in the Settings under Export > Email. This is convenient if you always want to use your work email to email documents while keeping your phone's default email account as personal.

- Improved document renaming: auto-capitalization, auto-correction and word suggestions
- Fixes issue with back button being to close to the document title
- Fixed a couple glitches in animations!

New scanning technology

The scanning technology in Genius Scan 6 has been entirely rewritten to offer you much better scanning performance and quality:

- Document detection. Now powered by a next-generation AI, the document detection will instantly focus on your documents, even in tougher configurations. For instance, the document detection won't be confused anymore if you scan a white document on a white desk!
- Smarter filtering. Genius Scan 6 is much more accurate when it detects the best filter to apply to your document.
- Enhanced filtering. Genius Scan 6's new filters are incredibly good at removing shadows from your documents. The new color filter lets you scan documents in color, while still ensuring the great contrast you would have in black and white. Genius Scan 6 also cleans the edges of your documents: If you haven't cropped the document perfectly, that's not a problem, Genius Scan will remove the artifacts that are left.

Document renaming

- Smart Document Renaming helps you rename your documents quickly, by suggesting relevant pieces of your document's content and more.

And much more…

- In the Settings, we've added the ability to cancel pending Text Recognition operations.
- We've fixed numerous bugs such as:

Properly re-apply Text Recognition to documents that are changed while being processed.
Prioritize documents for Text Recognition when Text Recognition button is tapped.
